trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Chattanooga
There were no other sightings in Chattanooga on or around March 18th 2011
Summary: very shiny metallic looking objecy changing in color floating
divs: Sighting DetailsI got off work and driving home when i saw the object the sky. It was very shiny and metallic looking. It wasn't a plane or helicopter because it would change colors and it was as if it was following me. As i was driving i kept staring at it and almost made me have an accident by running off the road. I then decided to park my vehicle on the side of the road to get a better look. It then disappeared out of sight. The shape of the object was like that if a star and would not move anywhere just float in the air. It kind of scared me but I was really curious about it thats why I stopped to get a better look. And also it was very close to land when I saw it.
